title: Helleborns Nouus || et quidem Meracus/ nuper ex || Vtopia allatus, Gregorio Schamotulino Posnae || agenti, A CHRISTOPHORO HE-||GENDORFFINO doni loco missus || Comperiet Lector candidus, in hoc libello || preter alia, & scripturarum sanctarum & || legum ac Canonum locos non parum || multos diligenter excussos.||
creator: Hegendorph, Christoph  Snopek, Grzegorz
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Hegendorph, Christoph  Snopek, Grzegorz: Helleborns Nouus || et quidem Meracus/ nuper ex || Vtopia allatus, Gregorio Schamotulino Posnae || agenti, A CHRISTOPHORO HE-||GENDORFFINO doni loco missus || Comperiet Lector candidus, in hoc libello || preter alia, & scripturarum sanctarum & || legum ac Canonum locos non parum || multos diligenter excussos.||. Frankfurt/Oder  Berlin 1536
